text: Jay A. Switzer is an American chemist, currently the Curators’ Distinguished Professor and Donald L. Castleman/FCR Missouri Endowed professor of Discovery in Chemistry at the Missouri University of Science and Technology. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:Missouri University of Science and Technology faculty Category:21st-century American chemists Category:Wayne State University alumni Category:University of Cincinnati alumni
title: Jay Switzer (chemist)
